text: Mountaintown Creek is a stream in Gilmer County, Georgia, United States, that is a tributary of the Coosawattee River. The creek was named after "Mountain Town", a local Native American settlement. ==See also== * List of rivers in Georgia (U.S. state) ==References== Category:Rivers of Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Bodies of water of Gilmer County, Georgia
title: Mountaintown Creek
